text.value: Click the GPS button (works best outside)
Did the child give assent, and parent or guardian consent?
If yes, do you know how many times have you taken Mectizan?
If yes, how many times have you taken Mectizan?
How will the individual's unique ID be generated?
Please record the following unique ID code for the respondent on a separate list and on each diagnostic test(s) adminstered, including Dry Blood Spot tests.
You just entered a value that will end the survey

bind.jr:constraintMsg: Invalid. Recorder ID code is 2 numbers long.

bind.relevant: (selected(/data/p_Consent, 'Yes')) and (/data/p_AgeYrs=5 or /data/p_AgeYrs=6 or /data/p_AgeYrs=7 or /data/p_AgeYrs=8 or /data/p_AgeYrs=9 or /data/p_AgeYrs=10)
(selected(/data/p_IVM, 'Yes')) and (selected(/data/p_Consent, 'Yes')) and (/data/p_AgeYrs=5 or /data/p_AgeYrs=6 or /data/p_AgeYrs=7 or /data/p_AgeYrs=8 or /data/p_AgeYrs=9 or /data/p_AgeYrs=10)

(selected(/data/p_IVM, 'Yes')) and (selected(/data/p_Consent, 'Yes')) and (selected(/data/p_KnowIvmTimes, 'Yes')) and (/data/p_AgeYrs=5 or /data/p_AgeYrs=6 or /data/p_AgeYrs=7 or /data/p_AgeYrs=8 or /data/p_AgeYrs=9 or /data/p_AgeYrs=10)
(selected(/data/p_Consent, 'Yes')) and (/data/p_AgeYrs=5 or /data/p_AgeYrs=6 or /data/p_AgeYrs=7 or /data/p_AgeYrs=8 or /data/p_AgeYrs=9 or /data/p_AgeYrs=10)

(selected(/data/p_Consent, 'Yes')) and (selected(/data/p_IDMethod, 'Scanner')) and (/data/p_AgeYrs=5 or /data/p_AgeYrs=6 or /data/p_AgeYrs=7 or /data/p_AgeYrs=8 or /data/p_AgeYrs=9 or /data/p_AgeYrs=10)
